query:
SELECT 'hotel' as type, name, checkInDate, checkOutDate FROM hotels WHERE tripId = 30001 AND (checkInDate >= 1725235200000 AND checkInDate < 1725321600000)
UNION ALL
SELECT 'transportation' as type, CONCAT(origin, ' to ', destination), departureDate, arrivalDate FROM transportation WHERE tripId = 30001 AND (departureDate >= 1725235200000 AND departureDate < 1725321600000)
UNION ALL
SELECT 'car_rental' as type, company, pickupDate, dropoffDate FROM carRentals WHERE tripId = 30001 AND (pickupDate >= 1725235200000 AND pickupDate < 1725321600000)
UNION ALL
SELECT 'site' as type, name, visitDate, visitDate FROM touristSites WHERE tripId = 30001 AND (visitDate >= 1725235200000 AND visitDate < 1725321600000)
ORDER BY checkInDate;
